content_html: The Village of Granisle continues to be under a water quality advisory issued nearly three weeks ago, after laboratory testing detected the presence of total coliform bacteria in the community water system. The advisory recommends that people with weakened or undeveloped immune systems take precautions before using tap water. Those considered most at risk include the elderly, pregnant women, children under the age of two, people with AIDS, cancer, diabetes, kidney disease, or anyone receiving immuno-suppressing medications.
